Name: Animals Memory: Monkeys
About the game: Animals Memory: Monkeys is a card game with images of various monkeys that will test your memory. The goal of the game is to find paired cards. This part of the game is more difficult to pass than the very first part of the game 'Animals Memory' because there are images exclusively of monkeys, and because of this you can get confused. Features of the game: - Different difficulty levels. From simple to complex. - 52 cards with images of monkeys. - It develops memory and is suitable for children of all ages, infants, preschool children, schoolchildren, teenagers and adults. - 18 levels. Starting from easy and ending with large and complex levels.
